casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Joseph Chester PICI, Appellant, v. E. C. BROMBERG, Acting Divisional Director of Immigration. No. 9022. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Feb. 5, 1946. Decided Feb. 8, 1946. Charles P. Pearson, of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant. Edward C. Boyle, of Pittsburgh, Pa. (Charles F. Uhl, U. S. Atty., of Pittsburgh, Pa., on the brief), for appellee.

Before MARIS, McLAUGHLIN, and O’CONNELL, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the district is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Gibson, 61 F.Supp. 655.
